title: Kim Kardashian has Saint, three, and Chicago, try on their dad Kanye West's new kids Yeezy slides
text:
When Kanye West comes up with new children's footwear, his own little tykes naturally get first dibs to try them on.

And on Wednesday night is wife Kim Kardashian posted Insta Stories footage of their son Saint, three, and daughter Chicago, one, doing just that.

Kim, 38, showed her 149 million Instagram followers three shades of Kids Yeezy Slides as well as her children walking around in the kicks.

Heartwarming: Kim Kardashian shared a video of her one-year-old daughter Chicago wearing Kanye West's new Kids Yeezy Slides

Over some footage of Saint wearing the brand new slides, the mother of four proudly wrote: 'He won't take them off'.

Kim married Kanye with a 2014 Florentine ceremony, and they also share six-year-old daughter North and five-month-old son Psalm.

She told fans on her Insta Stories over the summer that the four children she has with her third and current husband are enough.

There they are: Kim, 38, showed her 149 million Instagram followers three shades of Kids Yeezy Slides as well as her children walking around in the kicks

Family time: Kim and Kanye's three-year-old son Saint also got to try on a pair of the footwear, as seen on his mother's Insta Stories

'I LOVE my babies so much but 4 is all I can handle with how busy I am, and each one of my babies needs so much attention,' she wrote during a Q&A.

Kim welcomed Chicago and Psalm via surrogacy and the latter was born on May 9 - three days after his parents walked the Met Gala red carpet.

On a new episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashian, Kim could be seen fretting about the closeness of the Met Gala and the surrogate's due date.

So sweet: Over some footage of Saint wearing the brand new slides, the mother of four proudly wrote: 'He won't take them off'

'I mean, it has taken eight months to get our Met look perfect, and I committed to it and I can't miss this,' said the reality star and sex tape icon.

Kim also happened to be covering that month's Vogue for editor-in-chief Anna Wintour, the impresario of the Met Gala.

Now an aspiring lawyer, Kim told Vogue this year that her plan is to skip law school and go straight to taking the bar exam after apprenticing at a legal firm.
description: When Kanye West comes up with new children's footwear, his own little tykes naturally get first dibs to try them on.
